tool_description: Records structured observations of child behavior and development during activities, providing standardized data collection for milestone tracking.

activity_context.description: Context where observation occurred: free_play, structured_activity, meal_time, outdoor_play, social_interaction

developmental_domains.description: Domains addressed: cognitive, language, motor, social-emotional, adaptive

duration_minutes.description: Length of observation period in minutes (5-120)

notes.description: Additional qualitative notes about the observation

error_messages: Invalid profile ID: Profile not found in system
Invalid activity context: Use free_play, structured_activity, meal_time, outdoor_play, or social_interaction
Invalid domain: Use cognitive, language, motor, social-emotional, or adaptive
Invalid duration: Must be between 5 and 120 minutes
Empty behaviors list: Must include at least one observed behavior
Future observation date: Observation date cannot be in the future
usage: Record detailed observations by specifying the child, context, behaviors seen, and relevant developmental domains. Include duration and observer information for data quality.

observation_id.description: Unique identifier for this observation record

structured_data.description: Processed observation data formatted for analysis

milestone_indicators.description: Potential milestone achievements identified from observation

quality_score.description: Data quality score based on completeness and detail (0-10)
